name: In Search of Her (Windows)
description:
Narrative:

After dismembering and tossing the body parts of the female creature into the sea, Victor is starting feel remorse. In the dead of night, become Victor and recover the body parts from barrels sitting at the bottom of the sea.

Controls:

WASD to walk/swim

Left Shift to sprint

Ctrl to crouch

Spacebar to jump

Escape to close the game

Jump in the water to start swimming immediately.

Barrels are automatically picked up when in range.

There is no win state, so after picking up 8 barrels, feel free to quit or continue exploring.

*All assets were sourced from the Unity store and YouTube, except the general terrain
